Detailed Description

This file contains the GPMC controller specific struct definition, macros and function prototypes.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define GPMC_V1_CMD_ECCCONTROL   (GPMC_CMD_RESERVED + 21U)

Enable or disable ECC.

Command code used with GPMC_control()

#define GPMC_V1_CMD_ECCGETBCHRESULT   (GPMC_CMD_RESERVED + 25U)

Get ECC BCH result.

Command code used with GPMC_control()

get ECC result

Command code used with GPMC_control()

Command code used with GPMC_control()
